question: Which PSU has won the National Awards for Excellence in PSU in the Investment in Start-Ups Category?
explanation:
The team TRIFED Warriors has bagged the “National Awards for Excellence – PSU” in the Investment in Start-Ups Category.
The awards are hosted by the World HRD Congress to recognize the outstanding initiatives taken by Government departments, Public Sector Units and industries. TRIFED won in three categories: CEO of the Year, Visionary Leadership Award and Investment in Start-Ups.
